values: I'm not keen on this working every single day.  I woke up and because it's Sunday felt rather pissed off that i had to forfeit my one day of allowed laziness.  The library isn't too bad today, although it's really busy for a Sunday and people keep complaining about stupid things or expect us to find all the book codes for them.  Here's to another seven days of constant work!
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/21718.html

Hey everyone it's been a while.  Hope to write a longer message later.  In the meantime I've found a new job working in a lawyer's office as a general assistant/ typist/ telephonist/ dogsbody!! although I am being trained in conveyancing so hopefully that will go well. It's all good experience though.  I'm learning so much.  Also rejoined the gym so feeling much healthier of late.  

Have a quick question that I'll put to you all.  Been thinking of applying for a postgraduate course.  What do you think I should do Publishing or Librarianship?   

Hope you're all well and I see you soon!
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/21424.html

I'm tired of uni work.  My Theatre Studies tutor has given us a week to write a report on last Thursday's performance(which surprizingly went rather well).  The report is to be 2,500 and presented as an academic essay with at least five background reading sources. I've managed to write it in three days, virtually unheard of for me. Its rubbish though but I have limited time available to me. Now I just have to panic about Scottish Literature, which is definitely on this Monday.  I know there's no point dwelling on it but if the exam hadn't been moved forward I would have two weeks from today to study for it, instead of a measly four days.  There goes any hope of getting a good degree, I don't know why I've had such earlier deadlines this year.  Anyone got any good excuses for phoning into work sick with!   

All be over with soon I suppose, cherish the thought of life without studying...
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/20006.html

Everything seems to be happening at once.  If anyone has any stress beating tips for me I would be so grateful. And to think all would be fine if Scot Lit hadn't moved their exam 11 days forward.  I could cry.  I don't know what to do.  I have so much to do and so little time to do it in. I can feel that great degree mark slipping away from me and everyone laughing and calling me thick when I get a shitty mark. I haven't done anything today, thanks to worry, the fear of failure, and the fact that I'm physical shaking.  I wish I was naturally brainy like so many people I know, but I'm not and have to put the hours in.  Hours I don't have.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/19476.html

I really should have went to uni today, but... Ended up getting a lot done at home and sometimes thats the best thing, one of those greater good moments when you realize I may not have been to class, but got 800 words of an essay written.  I had a nice time being at home today.  I studied in my pyjamas, which is a guilty pleasure I all too readily indulge in.  Who needs proper clother anyway?  I also got to indulge in another guilty pass time, watching Loose Women.  Complete tripe, but fabulous, a lot like the way I feel about Footballers' Wives.  

Had a quiet weekend.  It was my cousin's 30th birthday, so my aunt had a party in her house for him on Saturday night.  It was good fun, but I arrived home at 12.30am, sober and disorientated.  My body was at home, but my mind was in a club pretending to be a sugababe.  I still feel slightly disorientated.  I'm at home again tomorrow, which is good.  I'm so glad there's no Theatre Studies meeting tomorrow.  Brushing hair and putting on makeup can become really boring.  I may need to go out for a walk though.  I'm sure being cooped up in my room all day is not good, and I still haven't handed out my quota of birthday gifts.  

Right now though I'm hungry and need to eat. 
xx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/17441.html

Been trying to do dissertation work for the past half hour, but its not really working.  Its my own fault.  If I have a lie in I know I'm never going to be in that mindset.  I done so well yesterday too.  I just can't focus.  Maybe I should take whole day which I might have to do.  I'm really annoyed with myself.  I will make sure that tomorrow morning I'm up bright and early.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/15138.html
My mum just phoned from LA.  She really loved going to see Karen, and she says Emma is just wonderful.  So she's now away to Las Vegas.  Jealous, me?  Well... yes.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/14114.html

Hi all, 

Thanks to Drutt and Laura0141 for their kind comments the other day.  They really meant a lot to me.  Had my journalism presentation today.  It went okay except I was a bit nervous and I didn't have any visual aids.  Also the class ended up talking about Jade Goody's columns for about 10 minutes even though I didn't mention it once.  However they didn't laugh at my theory of Bridget Jones Diary being an intellectual column which was nice.  The new laptop which my dad bought is absolutely useless.  I'm going to insist he sends it back and instead of buying from Dell again, we go into a shop and purchase one complete with instructions since bugger all came with that one.  I don't think we should pay for something which crashes the second time you use it and cannot open its own instructions or word package.  I am cursed as far as technology goes, just like Hurley in Lost with his numbers.  Been a bit of a strange week.  I'll be glad when this week is over.  

xx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/13634.html
I'm very stressed!  I don't know if I can keep studying to June. I feel like I keep working yet nothing gets done. Just had a massive cry.  I feel slightly better but look even worse than usual!
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/13444.html

Had a rather nice day today.  The bookcrossing meeting went well and then I went to see Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire with my parents.  I think its the best one yet.  Shed a little tear at the end. I'm very tired though so think I'd better head off to bed.  Nighty night.
xx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/13228.html

Bit early for class today so thought I'd post summat.  It's such a lovely morning!  Its so nice to be out in the sunshine and even nicer that the train was early.  Jordanhill campus looks gorgeous in the sunshine.  I'm a little weird about trains at the moment.  I got on the wrong one on Monday and ended up in an express train to Motherwell!  However on arrival in Motherwell I was befriended by a pretty young man, who sadly was extremely camp.  Anyway I better make this comment short as my class starts in 5 minutes.  

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/12460.html
Just waited half an hour for Jonathan to show up... he never.  If I fail my dissertation I hold him personally responsible.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/11609.html

Just a quick note to say I'm back at Uni and the library has the coolest new computers.  Apparantly Donald isn't seeing people until 2 so I have to wait until then if I want to change class.  Its very frustrating.  Got a million things to do at home.  Had a mini crisis this morning when I thought my freeview box was broken, but alas I fixed it.  I'm becoming an addict its so sad!

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/9718.html

Just reading Laura 0141's quote on Oscar Wilde which got me thinking about a great quote I read in the paper regarding Courtney Love and Robbie Williams.  Here it follows:

Courtney to Robbie:  I asked my friends who I should sleep with and they said you, but I can't because of the whole pop thing.

Robbie to Courtney:  I can't sleep with you either... because of the whole ugly thing.

Genius!!!!
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/8533.html

Today is the first day the changing of the seasons has been most apparent.  I think we are now definitely in Autumn.  It was weird being in the library and looking at the blacness outside.  It now feels like I'm meant to be going back to Uni; and Laura P's been in touch asking about class times etc.  Suddenly I'm very scared yet excited about change!  
xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/8352.html

My parents got back from Cyprus last night.  I'm really glad they're back, I suddenly realized when they walked through the door just how much I'd missed them and almost cried.  I tend to get over-emotional though at times so I'm not too concerned.  Laura B is back at Stirling now,  and is settling into her new flat well.  She has informed me though that I'm going out with her and Margaret on Saturday.  Laura is fab, she's almost as frivolous as me!  

Back to the homecoming though,  I had cleaned the house to such pristine standards that I was horrified when my dad dumped his suitcase on the living room floor and proceeded to light up a fag.  Today went bizarrely well.  I got up early, sat and had brekkie whilst watching Natasha Kaplinsky and co., and was early for work!  My mum also made me a lovely salad for dinner and I'm still full.  Also Beryl agreed to give me a reference which was very kind of her.  I'm kind of sad about leaving the library.  I'm living in a sort of bubble at the moment, which is nice, but I know its time to move on and go back to Uni and resume my academic life.  I'm looking forward to it and am slightly apprehensive, bizarre considering I know lots of people.

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/8174.html
Oh meant to say that both Judy Bloom's 'Forever' and Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone have been dropped from the Children's Lit class this year.  I'm so mad....
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/7108.html

Went for lunch with LJ and Lynne today.  So sad that LJ is going to Spain and Lynne is moving to Glasgow Uni.  Going to be all on my ownsome.  Maybe some kind of ubercool gang will invite me to be friends with them.  Can't face a year of being on my own.  Just finished cleaning again.  Honestly I don't know how people survive without Anti-bacterial surface cleaner.  Its an absolute god send.  Maybe I'll do a washing or just watch TMF some more...

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/6841.html
I really want the new Goldfrapp album.  If anyone has it is it good, as good as Black Cherry?
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/5922.html
Just seen the new McFly video.  Does anyone know if they're over 18 yet?  If not I'm worried.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/5128.html
Went out as per usual last night.  Garage was absolutely mobbed and now I'm all bruised.  I didn't even get drunk, how weird is that! On the plus side went out driving today and done very well.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/4804.html

of times I've been on the phone to the Inland Revenue in the past two weeks.  I'm sick of listening to the same Lucie Silvas song and if I phone up any more times the staff at IR will be on my Christmas card list.  Its not they're fault, but the council's. They're all a bunch of effing idiots.  I think they must just stare out of their windows all day.  On the plus side I have a new sleek haircut that I love with layers throughout.  Loving it!  Also very excited cause the BB finale is tonight.  Eugene to win I say, although it would be absolutely hilarious if Kinga won or even better Kinga and Eugene to wed!  

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/4367.html

I'm so tired I think I may have to have another early night.  Yesterday was knackered and missed book meet up as I miraculously fell asleep just after my tea.  I'm trying to be all organized and good, but I just wanna sleep.  Haven't even started any dissertation work.  Such a loser...

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/4058.html

What a bizarre day I had.  Ended up working in both Cambuslang and Rutherglen library.  It was like being in two different worlds.  Whereas the staff in Cambuslang are older and more the traditional sort, Rutherglen was full of glamness - the children's assistant beared more than a passing resemblance to Catherine Zeta Jones.  It was all very strange.  I think I was only sent down there so Jean and Jemima could gossip all night as sending Jem would have been far more sensible, but I couldn't possibly comment, I am only the student after all.  I was chuffed this morning when my new Air - Moon Safari album arrived.  Strutted to work listening to Sexy Boy and had an overwhelming urge to buy myself a black jeep!  Isn't that strange...

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/3767.html

Just back from work.  I really hate being the youngest.  Wish I had a partner in crime to cause mischief with.  I'm really pleased Laura has a date, altough it turns out that I'm 95% sure her date is the flatmate of a guy I pulled in the Garage a coupla weeks ago.  I'm all sad now, thinking of my friends with their boyfriends. I want one too, I'm all alone, nobody wants me!  Maybe I should start investing in some kind of single woman pension plan, rather than build my hopes up.  Singledom is inevitable.  I'm being a homebody tonight and going to bed early to watch telly and read Morvern Callar, which I'm loving.  I'm quite excited too as I may be getting a lap top soon as my PC is playing up again.  Yeah!!!

xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/3300.html
On Wednesday I also met LJ.  Went for a coffee to Coffee Merchant.  I'm really sad she's going to Madrid now.  I feel like all my friends are abandoning me cause I'm not good enough or summat.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/2607.html
I'm in Uni trying to be intelligent and look for books discussing 'The Divided Self'.  I'm bored though.  Think I'll go and buy some chocolate.  xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/2184.html

Grr.. have some sort of on/off cold which is really annoying me.  Went to the Stand on Monday night to see the Monkey Boys which was fab!  I haven't laugh that hard for ages.  At the end of the show the comedians sang a song in homage to Jude Law who was caught shagging his children's nanny to the tune of Hey Jude.  Hilarious!  Ann had been recommending the Monkey Boys for ages, so I'm glad I went.  During the show I couldn't help admiring compere for the evening Sandy Nelson against all logic.  Going out again today since its my day off and all.  Laura B specifically requested we go somewhere else other than Pizza Hut so hopefully we can go to La Tasca or Di Maggios.  Paying a trip up to the Uni library also to return my pornographic Judy Blume book.  I can't believe its been included in a Children's Lit class.  Anyway I better go and get dressed since it's midday and all.  

ByeBye xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/1993.html

Just seen Science evicted from Big Brother.  Who cares though, I just want Craig and Ant to finally face up to the love that's bubbling under. Well its the weekend.  Tomorrow I'm at work, then off to my date.  I'll see how that goes.  I feel a bit uneasy about the whole thing to be honest, but I did say I wanted to go out on more dates until I feel ready for the scary scenario that is a relationship.  Just finished some of my WKD Vodka Iron Bru.  Isn't WKD fab.  In fact, vodka in general is fab!  Will have to watch what I drink tomorrow though.  Nothing worse than trying to get home alone when you're paralytic.  xxx

P.S I think I may be in lust with Brandon Flowers from the Killers
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/1339.html

Took advantage of not being at work today by going walking around Rutherglen, Cambuslang and Burnside for two hours.  I slept into one o'clock today which definitely wasn't planned, but I guess I needed the sleep.  Going to have a lazy night as well.  Might try and read some more of Tom Sawyer, although my eye keeps wondering off to the copy of Morvern Callar I have sitting on my desktop. It's been a weird day.  It was awful to hear about the recent events in London.  My heart goes out to them.   xxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/1125.html

My mother said the scariest thing to me today.  She reminded me that I only have one year left of uni and then I have to work to the end of my days.  I'm scared.  I suppose I could always faff a bit like Dave Gorman who travelled the world in a bid to meet other men called Dave Gorman.  I ended up staying overnight with Laura and Laura on Wednesday.  Stayed up to about 3am watching Sex and the City DVS.  Of course I did that thing that all girls do and thought, mmm I wonder which one of the gals am I... and came to conclusion that alas I am indeed Stanford.  Last night I met up with LJ and Lauren.  Don't know where Lynne was.  Fear she may have been abducted by aliens!!!  Was very sad as they're both going away for a year come September.  Felt really guilty as I prob could have been a better friend, and now they're leaving.  I think I may need to change my behaviour actually.  At times I feel myself becoming a bit of a shit, which is odd cause I know deep down I'm ok really.  Not perfect, but its normal to have a slight amount of bitchiness in your blood.  It's what makes the world go around.  Was working at Halfway library today.  Lots of children running about, and someone almost broke the photocopier.  Gasp!  Mind you there was a full sized fan placed on top of the photocopier so it obviously can't be that important to them.  Unlike in Cambuslang with Beryl.  She would never tolerate such abomnable behaviour.  

Anyway have to go watch Big Brother.  Vanessa or Makosi is about to be evicted.  Have to go watch it.  Drama, drama, drama!!!!

xxxxxxxxxxx
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/602.html

Sunday.
My room is still like a sauna.  I have my windows open and my fan on, but nothing will deter the heat.  What is it about peeps from Scotland.  We're so bad at dealing with the hot weather?  Went to the Garage with Laura B last night.  It was surprizingly quieter than it usually is.  Met Katy and Theresa there.  Haven't seen them in so long.  It was really cool to see them.  It made me think of all the people I've lost contact with.  I'm going to start contacting people again.  It could be fun.  They could tell me to F off but you don't know unless you try.  Working in library again this week.  Got a day off Thursday, so looks like I'll be painting the town pink on Wednesday night.  Woohoo.  Off to get some water now before I dehydrate in my oven of a room.
Goodnight.
http://lesley1984.livejournal.com/412.html
